Mario Kart 64 Skip Trainer.


This is a tool created to help learn the speedrunning shortcut skips in Mario Kart 64.
This is based on nbarkhina's N64Wasm N64 emulator

First set any controls with the button.

Then click over on the left

By clicking onto the section, you can jump to any level, as well as pre set up jumps. First set your controls if needed, and then click to play game. Once it boots, a savestate can be loaded (for example: the Frappe Snowland jump preparation,ℹ️



Click "load savestate" up at the top to load from the last savestate. F8 will also do a quickload of this.

Once you click any of the savestates in the guide, it will overwrite the one saved in the browser. If you want a temporary savestate, you can click "save savestate" but this will be overwritten the next time you click one of those links. You can also click to download a savestate, and you can load it under the game box. Note that you will need to wait a moment then click "load savestate" again

There is a suggested order to learn these skips in, but my favourite are the Wario Stadium ones, so you may already have one that you want to practice

For a video of the current top record run (with skips), please click

If you don't know where to start, there are some suggestions for priorites over in Abney's guide here:

Luigi Raceway - 1-1

ℹ️

Luigi Raceway Red shell jump. Difficulty 1
ℹ️
This one involves heading forward, grabbing some red shells, and then heading back to the start line where the aim is to fire red shells backwards near the start, and then head towards the wall to your right. If timed correctly, you will be hit and it will flip you over the wall.


Luigi Raceway mushroom jump. Difficulty : Too hard for me. Discovered in 2021
ℹ️
See video.You can jump over the wall.


Luigi Raceway Finish line skip. Difficulty : Too hard for me. Discovered in 2021

See video. When lining up with mushrooms you get enough space to go through the wall slightly and then bounce back on the other side of the wall finishing a lap.




Moo Moo Farm - 1-2

ℹ️
There are no known skips for this level

Koopa Troopa Beach - 1-3

ℹ️
There are no known skips for this level

Kalimari Desert - 1-4

ℹ️

Train tunnel skip
ℹ️
This involves getting a star, and then heading into the tunnel until you are told to reverse. At this point, activate the star and head back, having skipped the lap

Toad's Turnpike - 2-1

ℹ️
There are two main skips for this level:

Wall jump to road below
ℹ️
For the first lap, jump into the wall on the left just before the roads cross over. This will result in you getting put back on the track. As you are placed down, accelerate just before you are touched down, and you should have the speed to swing immediately right, and jump over the wall. If you have done it fast enough, it won't give the timer for being picked up chance to reset, and you will fall to the track below rather than being picked up for going out of bounds.


Second jump
For subsequent laps you can then jump the fence just after the start line to do the skip

Frappe Snowland - 2-2

ℹ️

Initial bridge jump
ℹ️
For this you need to drive backwards onto the bridge, then jump from the bridge to the snow on the right hand side without touching the road on the way. You can then drive past the finish track and off the side to be reset to the bridge having done a lap. Rince and repeat.

Choco Mountain - 2-3

ℹ️

Mario Raceway - 2-4

ℹ️

Wario Stadium - 3-1

ℹ️

Wall jump 1
ℹ️
Jump over the wall at to the left of the start. This will skip half of the map. If you curve round and manage to get over back over the wall behind the finish line then you can complete the lap, but I haven't managed that myself, so I do them separately


The return jump

Line yourself up with the finish line and then jump over the wall just to the right of the line. Too far right and you will be picked up, too far left (over the line) and it will undo the skip you already did


Jump 3
ℹ️
These are easier, but less effective than the two skips above


Jump 4
ℹ️
These are easier, but less effective than the two skips above

Sherbet Land - 3-2

ℹ️

Royal Raceway - 3-3

ℹ️

Large skip to the ramp
ℹ️
This involves curving off the road, boosting and jumping in the aim of hitting a polygon across the river This will reset you and place you on the ramp.



Jump from the ramp
ℹ️
The aim is to curl off to the left, and end up on the edge of the cliff at the end of the river channel. Check the video to see

Bowser's Castle - 3-4

ℹ️
There are no known skips for this level

DK's Jungle Parkway - 4-1

ℹ️

Tunnel clip
ℹ️
Drive into the tunnel behind you, then turn around and attempt to clip at the corner between the tunnel wall and the grass (clipping out and then back in). Check the video or the guide by Abney linked above (it has some images to make it easier to understand))


Yoshi Valley - 4-2

ℹ️

Cliff wall skip
ℹ️
This requires either mushrooms, or at a pinch, a star. If you head back to the finish line,and turn to facethe cliff just to the right of the egg that is in the distance. Boost then jump and you are trying to hit the seam on the cliff as you go down. This will skip part of the level.


Banshee Boardwalk - 4-3

ℹ️
There are no known skips for this level

Rainbow Road - 4-4

ℹ️

Initial leap of faith
ℹ️
At the start get some speed up then hook over to the left and jump the wall to drop down to the track below


ending green shell
ℹ️
This involves hitting yourself and flipping you over the right hand edge with a green shell, a little before the finish line. You need a green shell to do this. You need the speed to pass the finish line. It will pop you back ontop the course a lap later


Skipping info

A video explaining some of the more obtuse exploits, by Bismuth, Weatherton, Forest64, and micro500
